name: Echo Papa 607
description:
Finally, a game for all Friends of Desoto.  Everywhere.

I am a little bit embarassed to have made this game based on the hit podcast The Greatest Generation.

Basically a Space Invaders clone with some inside jokes all over the place.  (If you don't get it, you should really start listening to and donating generously to The Greatest Generation.)

Features:

  • Power up that season 1 face with a BEARD!
  • Lots of jokes that will get old the first time you play!
  • Music that I didn't make

The game was inspired by a tweet made by one of the podcast hosts:

Dear Ben and Adam, you inspire us all to better ourselves with your dick and fart jokes and two-bit impressions.  Please consider this game a love letter from all FoDs to both of you, for all you do.   I hope you play it at least once.

Credits:

  • I actually made like 5 graphics for this game from scratch 😲
  • All of The Friends of Desoto at http://drunkshimoda.com
  • Main theme "The Picard Song" by DarkMateria
  • Level music by Joe Reynolds - Professorlamp
  • Boss music by Matthew Pablo
  • Victory Fanfare by Jon K. Fite
  • Other graphics borrowed from the Star Trek Timelines wiki and Trekcore.com
